channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Yammer Desktop App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Yammer Desktop App

item.title: CVE-2018-8569|2024-08-05T07:02:25.443Z -- microsoft -- yammer%20desktop%20app
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Yammer desktop application due to the loading of arbitrary content, aka "Yammer Desktop Application Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Yammer Desktop App.
